koohiiStory1: The bamboo generation smokes bamboo grass.
koohiiStory2: “One of the most attractive aspects of bamboo is that it is a renewable resource; it takes less than a year for a stalk to reach maturity, compared to the decades for most trees, whether needle or broadleaf.” -- Mnemonic : "bamboo grass is the next bamboo generation".
myStory: tre non. cỏ tre. măng. chữ trúc và thế
